original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati pubbārāme migāra mātu pāsāde

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhu saṅgha parivutaḥ abbhokāse nisinnaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtam tuṇhībhūtam bhikkhu saṅgham anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “‘Ye te, bhikkhave, kusalā dhammā ariyā niyyānikā sambodhagāmino, tesaṁ vo, bhikkhave,
analyzed: ye te bhikkhave kusalāḥ dhammāḥ ariyāḥ niyyānikāḥ sambodha gāminaḥ tesam vaḥ bhikkhave

original: kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ariyānaṁ niyyānikānaṁ sambodhagāmīnaṁ kā upanisā savanāyā’ti,
analyzed: kusalānam dhammānam ariyānam niyyānikānam sambodha gāmīnam kā upanisā savanāya ati

original: iti ce, bhikkhave, pucchitāro assu, te evamassu vacanīyā:
analyzed: iti ce bhikkhave pucchitāraḥ assu te evam assu vacanīyā
yāvat eva dvayatānam dhammānam yathābhūtam ñāṇāya ati
idam dukkha ayam dukkha samudayaḥ ti ayam ekā anupassanā

original: Ayaṁ dukkhanirodho, ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti, ayaṁ dutiyānupassanā.
analyzed: ayam dukkha nirodhaḥ ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati ayam dutiyā anupassanā

original: Evaṁ sammā dvayatānupassino kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—
analyzed: evam sammā dvaya tā anupassinaḥ kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ dvinnam phalānam aññataram phalam pāṭikaṅkha

original: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā”ti.
analyzed: diṭṭhā iva dhamme aññā sati vā upādisese anāgāmi tā ti

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
analyzed: idam vatvāna sugataḥ atha aparam etat avoca satthā

original: ‘Siyā aññenapi pariyāyena sammā dvayatānupassanā’ti, iti ce, bhikkhave, pucchitāro assu;
analyzed: siyā aññena api pariyāyena sammā dvaya tā anupassanā ti iti ce bhikkhave pucchitāraḥ assu

original: Yaṁ kiñci dukkhaṁ sambhoti sabbaṁ upadhipaccayāti, ayamekānupassanā.
analyzed: yam kiñci dukkham sambhoti sabbam upadhi paccayā ati ayam ekā anupassanā

original: Upadhīnaṁ tveva asesavirāganirodhā natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti, ayaṁ dutiyānupassanā.
analyzed: upadhīnam tu eva asesa virāga nirodhā na atthi dukkhassa sambhavaḥ ti ayam dutiyā anupassanā
yaḥ ve a vidvāḥ upadhim karoti

original: ‘Siyā aññenapi pariyāyena sammā dvayatānupassanā’ti, iti ce, bhikkhave, pucchitāro assu;
analyzed: siyā aññena api pariyāyena sammā dvaya tā anupassanā ti iti ce bhikkhave pucchitāraḥ assu

original: Yaṁ kiñci dukkhaṁ sambhoti sabbaṁ avijjāpaccayāti, ayamekānupassanā.

original: Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti, ayaṁ dutiyānupassanā.
analyzed: avijjāya tu eva asesa virāga nirodhā na atthi dukkhassa sambhavaḥ ti ayam dutiyā anupassanā

original: Yaṁ kiñci dukkhaṁ sambhoti sabbaṁ saṅkhārapaccayāti, ayamekānupassanā.

analyzed: taṇhāya tu eva asesa virāga nirodhā natthi dukkhassa sambhavaḥ ti ayam dutiyā anupassanā

original: Upādānānaṁ tveva asesavirāganirodhā natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti, ayaṁ dutiyānupassanā.
analyzed: upādānānam tu eva asesa virāga nirodhā na atthi dukkhassa sambhavaḥ ti ayam dutiyā anupassanā

sammappaññāya su diṭṭha ayam ekā anupassanā

original: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa …pe… sadevamanussāya idaṁ musāti upanijjhāyitaṁ, tadamariyānaṁ etaṁ saccanti yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṁ, ayaṁ dutiyānupassanā.

original: ‘Siyā aññenapi pariyāyena sammā dvayatānupassanā’ti, iti ce, bhikkhave, pucchitāro assu;

original: Evaṁ sammā dvayatānupassino kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—

original: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitāti.

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:

original: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsūti.
